request.description:
This endpoint allows the manager to create a new user in the system with a role of either **cashier** or **waiter**.

### üîê Access Control

- Only users who are **authenticated** **and verified** with the `manager` role can access this endpoint.
    

#### Allowed Roles

- `cashier`
    
- `waiter`

This endpoint is used to verify a newly registered user account using a one-time **verification token**.

#### üîê Access

- **No authentication** required (public endpoint).
    
- Only valid and unexpired verification tokens are accepted.
    

#### üîÑ URL Parameters

- `verificationToken` ‚Äî a unique token generated during registration and sent to the user's email.

This endpoint allows a user (e.g., admin, cashier, or waiter) to log into the system using their registered email and password.

‚ö†Ô∏è Verification Requirement

Only users whose accounts have been **verified** (e.g., via email confirmation) are allowed to log in.  
Unverified users will receive an error response and cannot access protected endpoints.

This endpoint allows users to initiate a password reset process by providing their registered email address.

If the email exists in the system and the user is verified, a **password reset link conatins a token** will be sent to that email.

---

### ‚ö†Ô∏è Verification Requirement

Only users with a **verified account** are eligible to request a password reset.  
Unverified users will receive an appropriate error message.

### üîë Reset Password

This endpoint allows users to **reset their password** using a valid reset token that was sent to their email.

It is the second step in the "Forgot Password" flow.

‚úÖ Requirements  
resetToken: Must be a valid, non-expired token associated with the user's email.

### üîÑ URL Parameters

- `{{restToken}}` ‚Äî One-time token sent to the user's email, required to reset the password.

### üë• Get All Users (Managers Only)

This endpoint retrieves a list of all registered users in the system.

---

### üîê Access Control

- Only users who are **authenticated** **and verified** with the `manager` role can access this endpoint.

response.name: ‚úÖ 200 Users Retrieved

item.name: Get A User By ID (Mangers Only)

request.description:
### üë§ Get a User by ID (Managers Only)

This endpoint allows to retrieve the details of a specific user by their ID.

---

### üîê Access Control

- Only users who are **authenticated** **and verified** with the `manager` role can access this endpoint.

item.name: Update A User By ID (Mangers Only)

request.description:
### ‚úèÔ∏è Update a User by ID (Managers Only)

This endpoint allows to update the details of an existing user by their ID.

---

### üîê Access Control

- Only users who are **authenticated** **and verified** with the `manager` role can access this endpoint.

item.name: Delete A User By ID (Mangers Only)

request.description:
### üóëÔ∏è Delete a User by ID (Managers Only)

This endpoint allows to permanently delete a user account by its ID.

---

### üîê Access Control

- Only users who are **authenticated** **and verified** with the `manager` role can access this endpoint.
